title: Japan’s National Tax Agency Revises Crypto Tax Rules: 30% Exemption
description:
Japan’s National Tax Agency has recently issued a notice outlining revisions to the corporate tax rules for cryptocurrencies. This move signifies a positive step towards enhancing the business environment and addressing concerns related to conducting cryptocurrency-related operations in Japan. As per the newly approved regulations, Japanese companies that issue tokens will be exempted from paying […]
